borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 FRONT Garden - Cherry Plum: 30% Crown reduction by 3m on all aspects to tidy and contain. Reason: To improve light penetration into residential flats and enhance overall aesthetics of tree.T2  - FRONT Garden Japanese zelkova: Crown reduction by 3m on all aspects to tidy and contain and clear form property windows by 4m. Reason: To improve light penetration into residential flats and enhance overall aesthetics of tree.T3 FRONT Garden Holly: Crown Lift to 4m. Reason: To improve access to property and maximise light penetration.T4  - REAR GARDEN Sycamore: Crown reduction by 3m on all aspects to tidy and contain.Reason: To improve light penetration to understory vegetation and enhance overall aesthetics of tree.T5 - REAR GARDEN - Holm Oak: Crown reduction by 3m on all aspects to tidy and contain. Reason: To improve light penetration to understory vegetation and enhance overall aesthetics of tree.
